modal.title: Runer√∂k
modal.p1: After the death of most of the gods in the Ragnar√∂k, a few survivors risk the right to hold Thor Mj√∂lnir's hammer and to be named Odin's successor and main leader in Asgard Castle. To win this right, they will have to get all the runes and the secret they keep to dominate absolute power. Only the first to get this will be the new host at Valhalla, so the rest of the rivals will not make it easy. Live the Runer√∂k experience and play the best strategy to sabotage your rivals and win the glory of such an hero.

toast.roomNotReady: Wait until all members are ready

instructions-ok.p1: Dices game where the goal is to get more runes
instructions-ok.p2: Each turn we start with 3 lifes
instructions-ok.p3: In a turn, we choose dices 3 by 3
instructions-ok.p4: There are 3 colors of dices, each one tells us the probability to get more runes or warriors coming out of the dices
instructions-ok.p7-2: if you keep on playing, you must keep on rolling this dice
instructions-ok.p9: After a round, if we are still alive, we will have to choose between sticking or keeping on playing
instructions-ok.p10: When we lose all 3 lifes, we die and lose the accumulated partial runes. Otherwise, if we stick earlier, partial runes are saved and accumulated by the end of the game.
instructions-ok.p11-2: are used to play instant actions inside or outside your turn
instructions-ok.p12: Click on an action in the action menu and play this snapshot in exchange for Valknut points.
instructions-ok.p13: The game ends when someone gets 13 runes or more
instructions-ok.p14: The rest of the players have one last chance to impress the gods by beating the opponent
instructions-ok.p15: At the end of the last round, the winner is the player with most points
instructions-ok.p16: In case of a tie, the winner is who gets all runes first

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.p1: This Privacy Policy sets out the terms on which you use and protect the information that is provided by your users when using your website. Runer√∂k is committed to the security of its users' data. When we ask you to fill in the fields of personal information with which you can be identified, we do so by ensuring that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. However this privacy policy may change over time or be updated so we recommend and emphasize that you continually review this page to ensure that you agree to these changes.
privacy.p2: This website may contain links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our page, we no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or protection of your data on these other third party sites. . These sites are subject to their own privacy policies so it is recommended that you consult them to confirm that you agree to these.
privacy.p3: You may at any time restrict the collection or use of personal information provided to us. However, this company will not sell, assign or distribute personal information that is collected without your consent.
privacy.p4: As a user of the website, you declare that you have been informed of the conditions regarding the protection of personal data, you accept and consent to their processing by the owner in the manner and for the purposes indicated in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.p5: Runer√∂k reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to new legislation or case law, as well as industry practices.
